title: Chao Neng Xingzhi Shikong Yingxiong
synopsis: A thousand years ago, Earth boy Bu Pingfan came to Phoenix Star Valley tens of thousands of light-years away due to another adventure, and participated in the Phoenix war against the brutal and dark bitter, and wrote a heroic poem! Thousands of years later, Xingjia from Lanjia and Edison from Phoenix Star Valley landed on Earth for different reasons. After being reborn, Xingjia met Xia Ji, Luna and other partners. Edison intends to involve the earth in his wild plan! A battle to defend the earth ended in the destruction of Edison! A few years later, the earth radiated new vitality in the process of peaceful development, until a new crisis approached-Dark Biting infected a group of interstellar thugs coming towards the earth. " (translated from iqiyi)
